Dear Mr. Underwood:
Thank you very much for sending me the list of your
network offerings. Gertrude Broderick and I have
gone over the list and neither of us are sufficiently
acquainted with the list to make intelligent selections.
We thought if you would send us the originating stations
for the list of programs enclosed, we would then write
asking for program descriptions.
ERNEST TIEMANN
Director, Visual Instruction
Bureau, University of Texas
PAUL W. F. Win-
Professor of Education, Teachers
College, Columbia University
